option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the help message and exit.
filename of the rawacf format file.
filename of the fitacf format file to create.
filename of the associated index file to create.
input file is in raw (dat) file format and the output should be in fit file format.
filename of the raw (dat) format file. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Creates a fit or fitacf format file from a raw (dat) or rawacf format file.

description.p: Creates a fit or fitacf format file from a raw (dat) or rawacf format file.
If the "-old" option is not specified then the fitacf format file is written to standard output.

example.description: Generates a fit file from the dat file "19971020.gbr.dat" to produce a file called "19971020.gbr.fit" and an index file called "19971020.gbr.inx".
Generates a fitacf file from the rawacf file "19981105.kap.rawacf" to produce a file called "19981105.kap.fitacf". Status is logged on standard error.
